object.name: deleteMessages
object.description: Use this method to delete multiple messages simultaneously. If some of the specified messages can't be found, they are skipped. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Use this method to delete multiple messages simultaneously. If some of the specified messages can't be found, they are skipped. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Use this method to delete multiple messages simultaneously. If some of the specified messages can't be found, they are skipped. Returns :code:`True` on success.

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format :code:`@channelusername`)
annotations.name: chat_id

annotations.description: A JSON-serialized list of 1-100 identifiers of messages to delete. See deleteMessage for limitations on which messages can be deleted
annotations.html_description: A JSON-serialized list of 1-100 identifiers of messages to delete. See deleteMessage for limitations on which messages can be deleted
annotations.rst_description: A JSON-serialized list of 1-100 identifiers of messages to delete. See :class:`aiogram.methods.delete_message.DeleteMessage` for limitations on which messages can be deleted
annotations.name: message_ids
